RelatedSentence: - Born in the United Kingdom , with experience living in Hong Kong and Singapore , Ng is eager to build bridges between researchers in China and the U.S. He notes that Baidu 's Silicon Valley research team will be augmented by some of his own prior research colleagues , including Adam Coates , who has been a post-doc researcher in Ng 's Stanford lab .
